StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetContractGoalViewForRegion]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@RegionOrgID int)
AS
SELECT ro.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OrgID, ro.SHORT_NAME AS OrgName, 1 AS FiscalYear, '' AS Contrac.ngMissionType, 0 AS [January], 0 AS [February], 0 AS [March], 0 AS [April], 0 AS [May], 0 AS [June], 0 AS [July], 0 AS [August], 0 AS [September], 0 AS [October], 0 AS [November], 0 AS [December] FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP om ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID AND ro.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'D' WHERE om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RegionOrgID
